R

Rank - Enum in utils
Possible Trainer Ranking values
removeAllVeterinarians() - Method in class content.Horse
Removes all the veterinarians assosiated with a given horse
removeBetFromBookMaker(GamblingBetsForCompetition) - Method in class content.BookMaker
Removes the GamblingBetsForCompetition object from GamblingBetsForCompetition Collection and updates the gain field of this BookMaker
removeBetFromCompetition(GamblingBetsForCompetition) - Method in class content.Competition
Removes a bet of a Bookmaker for a Gambler from this Competition
removeBetsInCompetition() - Method in class content.Gambler
Removes GamblingBetsForCompetition from Gambler object and updates also the gain fieldand the Account fileds of this Gambler
removeCompetitionFromHorse(HorseInCompetition) - Method in class content.Horse
Removes Horse from a Competition and update it participate times
removeEquestrian() - Method in class content.Horse
Removes an Equestrian object from Horse
removeEquestrianFromHorse(String, String, String) - Method in class init.BreedingHorses
Removes an exised Equestrian From an exised Horse and return false if: 1) The horse is not exists in the horses 2) The Equestrian is not exists in the persons map 3) The existed Equestrian doesn't related to the existed horse 4) The existed horse doesn't has the given Equestrian Otherwise this method makes a roll-back (i.e don't add the Equestrian from an existed horse) if the removing is not completly succeded
removeGamblingBetsForCompetition(String, String, String, String, String, int, Type) - Method in class init.BreedingHorses
Removes Gambler's bet for a Horse in a Competition It returns false if: 1) The given bookmaker is not exists in persons map 2) The given gambler is not exists in persons map 3) The given Competition is not exists 4) The given horse is not exists in horses map Otherwise this method makes a roll-back (i.e don't Removes the bet) if the removing is not completly succeded
removeHorse() - Method in class content.Equestrian
Removes horse from Equestrian object
removeHorse(Horse) - Method in class content.Trainer
Removes horse from trainer horse-array
removeHorse(Horse) - Method in class content.Veterinarian
Removes horse from veterinarian horses-array
removeHorse(String, String) - Method in class init.BreedingHorses
Removes Horse from horses map.
removeHorseFromCompetition(HorseInCompetition) - Method in class content.Competition
Removes a Horse from a Competition.
removeHorseFromCompetition(String, String, int, Type) - Method in class init.BreedingHorses
Removes Horse from Competition the method return false if: 1) The Horse is not exist in the horse map 2) The Horse is not participated in the given Competition Otherwise this method makes a roll-back (i.e don't remove the horse from the Competition) if the removing is not completly succeded
removePerson(Person) - Method in class init.BreedingHorses
Removes a given person from persons map It also checks if the object is already exist before removing
removeTrainer() - Method in class content.Horse
Removes a Trainer Object From Horse if the removing succeed then update the TotalWinnerHorses
removeTrainerFromHorse(String, String, String, String) - Method in class init.BreedingHorses
Removes an existed Trainer from an existed horse returns true if the removing process succeed, otherwise returns false if: 1) The horse is not exists in the horses map 2) The Trainer is not exists in the persons map 3) The existed horse does not have this Trainer Otherwise this method makes a roll-back (i.e don't removes the Trainer from the existed horse) if the removing is not completly succeded
removeVeterinarian(Veterinarian) - Method in class content.Horse
Removes a Veterinarian object from Horse
removeVeterinarianFromHorse(String, String, String, String) - Method in class init.BreedingHorses
Removes an existed Veterinarian from an existed horse returns true if the removing process succeed, otherwise returns false if: 1) The horse is not exists in the horses map 2) The Veterinarian is not exists in the persons map 3) The existed horse does not have this Veterinarian otherwise this method makes a roll-back (i.e don't remove the Veterinarian from an existed horse) if the removing is not completly succeded
